cards.rules_text:
First strike, haste, prowess
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may have Agronak fight target creature. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]
Creatures You control have Renown 2. [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)[/i]

Other Orcs you control get +1/+1.
Whenever an opponent searches their library, you may pay {1} and search your library for a card and put it into your hand.
Whenever an opponent attacks you, if they attack with only one creature you may each draw a card.
{X}: Target opponent gains control of X target creatures under your control until end of turn. Those creatures gain haste until end of turn.

Spells you control have a foretell cost equal to their mana cost minus {1}.
Permanents you control have protection from Nightmares. [i](This creature can't be blocked, targeted or dealt damage by Nightmares..)[/i]
{T}: Target creature you control cannot be blocked this turn.

Lifelink
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may draw a card and lose 1 life.
Whenever a creature you control dies put a +1/+1 on another target creature you control.

cards.card_name: Aid of the Seventh and Fifteenth
cards.special_text:
I — Create a number of 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens equal to the amount of mana spent to cast this Saga.
II — Prevent all damage that would be dealt to non-Orc creatures you control until your next turn.
III — Search your library for a Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

cards.rules_text:
Activated abilities of Food tokens you control cost {1} less to activate.
If a source other than Balagog would create a Food token, create an additional Food token.
{2}{T}: Create a Food token.
{2}{T}: Search your library for a card named “Uncommon Tastes”, and put it on the battlefield. Activate only if you control five or more Foods.

Double strike, menace
When Baloth Bloodtusk enters, support 4. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to four other target creatures.)[/i]
When Baloth Bloostusk deals damage, bolster 1. [i](Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
{3}: Baloth Bloodtusk fights target creature an opponent controls.

Dash {1}{R}{G} [i](You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i]
Reach, trample
When this creature enters, Orcs you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

Vigilance
Orc spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Other Orcs you control have +0/+2.
Whenever one or more counters are put on a creature you control, put an additional counter of the same type on it.
Whenever you become the monarch, if a creature died this turn, draw a card.

Outlaws you control cost {1} less to cast
Tap another outlaw you control: Tap target creature and put a stun counter on it.
{T}: Tap two other outlaws you control. Gain control of target artifact. [i](Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws.)[/i]

Trample
Orcs and Bears you control have +1/+1.
Whenever a Bear you control becomes blocked by a creature, that creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

Menace
If Yamarz would be dealt damage, you may sacrifice a treasure token and assign that damage to another target creature you control.
When Yamarz leaves the battlefield, you may search your library for a legendary Orc card with mana value X or less, where X is the number of treasures you control. Put that card into you hand then shuffle.

Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card and gain 1 life.
[i]Ferocious[/i] - If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Orcs you control have deathtouch.

Creatures you control have trample.
Other Bears and Orcs you control get +1/+1.
Whenever Coldwind and 3 or more other creatures attack, creatures you control gain frostwalk until end of turn. [i](They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow land.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Torug earned the respect of Coldwind simply by treating her as an equal.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this creature attacks alone, it gets +2/+0 and first strike until end of turn.
Whenever this creature deals damage, put a +1/+1 on target creature you control.

Knights and Soldiers you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token and scry 1.

Whenever you cast a historic spell, draw a card. [i](Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)[/i]
{3}: Tap a creature you control, then return an artifact from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Prowess
[i]Enrage[/i] – When Determined Initiate is dealt damage, instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast until your next turn.

When Eager Commis enters the battlefield, create a food token.
Whenever you draw a card, except for the first card you draw each turn, create a Food token.

Vigilance
Creatures enter with a shield counter on them. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
When Emmeg becomes equipped with a legendary equipment, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature with lesser power, then, transform Emmeg.
cards.rules_text2:
Menace
[i]Morbid[/i] — When Emmeg enters and at the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Emmeg.
[i]Delirium[/i] — If Emmeg is equipped, it attacks each combat if able as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

cards.rules_text:
Menace
Modified creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch and ward {1}. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications. Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)[/i]
{2}: Counter target instant, sorcery, or enchantment spell. You may activate this ability only once each turn.

Lifelink
{3}: Put an Influence counter on target creature, then take control of that creature.
When a creature with an Influence counter on it dies, put a +1/+1 counter on a target creature you control and draw a card.
Sacrifice a creature you control: Put a shield counter on another creature you control. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]

Artifacts you control cost {1} less to cast.
Artifacts opponents control cost {1} more to cast.
Equipment costs {1} less to equip.

Deathtouch
Undying [i](When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
Whenever an assassin you control dies, draw a card and either add or remove a +1/+1 counter on Garnag.

Walls you control can block an additional two creatures each combat.
As long as you control 3 or more walls, creatures assign combat damage equal to their toughness rather than their power.
Whenever a creature enters, bolster 1. [i](Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]

Ward {3}
Permanents you control have ward {1}.
Whenever a player casts a battle spell, counter that spell.
During each combat, if a player does not attack, you and that player may draw a card, and put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.

Lifelink, vigilance
Whenever you cast a non-creature spell create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
When an opponent attacks you, investigate {X}, where X is the number of creatures you control.

Trolls and Beasts you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Use this mana only to cast Troll or Beast creatures.

Haste
{X},{T}: Deal X damage divided among up to X target creatures.

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I — Target opponent gains control of target artifact you control. Put a Dowry counter on it. Creatures you control have nimble as long as that opponent controls that artifact.
II — Creatures you control gain “{1}: Tap target creature an opponent controls. Target creature you control gets -1/-0 until end of turn.” until end of turn.
III — Return target artifact with a dowry counter on it to your control. If that artifact was put into a graveyard, return it from the graveyard to the battlefield under your control. Then transform this saga.
cards.rules_text2:
Creatures you control have Nimble. [i](They can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.)[/i]
{2}{U}, {T}: Scry 1, then draw a card.

cards.rules_text:
Mentor [i](Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)[/i]

{3}: Exile target creature you control then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

You may cast creature cards from your graveyard except they become a 1/1 Zombie Spirit in addition to their other types and can't attack or block unless you pay an extra {2} when casting them.

Khartag must be blocked if able.
{3}: Change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

{5},{T}: Create X 1/1 white Soldier tokens, where X equals half the number of lands you control rounded down.

Menace, haste
When Kurog enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

{2}: Goad target opponent's creatures. [i](Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card.

Vigilance, Haste

Whenever you or a creature you control is dealt damage, create a clue token.
Whenever you sacrifice a clue, creatures you control gain vigilance until the end of turn.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 on target creature you control.

Lifelink

Whenever an opponent would activate an ability of a Food, you may copy that ability.

Menace, Haste
{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until the end of turn.

Vigilance

{T}: Add {R} or {G}

Haste

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I — Exile target God creature. If there are no Gods, Exile target Legendary creature instead.
Each player chooses one of the following.
Boethiah - Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
Trinimac - Put a Cursed Role token on each creature you control.
II — Return target creature to the battlefield under its owner's control. Put a Cursed role token on it.
III — Exile this saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
cards.rules_text2:
Cursed creatures you control get +X/+X, where X is the number of Cursed creatures you control.
When a creature you control is dealt combat damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
{3}{T}: You may have target creature you control fight target creature an opponent who has committed a crime against you controls. [i](Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever an opponent would commit a crime against you, target opponent chooses one of the two: [i](Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.)[/i]
- You copy the effect of the crime and choose a new target under that opponent's control or that opponent.
- You Create X treasure tokens where X equals the mana cost of the crime or target, or the amount of damage dealt if there was any.

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I — Search your library for an Island card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
II — Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X equals the number of creatures you control.
III — Destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls, then draw a number of cards equal to half the number of creatures you control, rounded down.

[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I — Until the end of your next turn, whenever a creature you control dies, create a colorless artifact token named “Sacred Stone” with {1},{T}: Add one mana of any color.
II — This saga gains “Sacrifice a land or artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature” and “Creatures with +1/+1 counters you control have ward {1}.”
III — You get an emblem with “Creatures you control attack each combat if able.”
Whenever a creature you control deals damage this turn, draw a card.

I — Reveal the top six cards of your library. You may put any number of Orc cards from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
II — This Saga gains, “Orcs you control gain ‘{T}: Add one mana of any color.'”
III — Put X +1/+1 counters on each Orc you control, where X is the number of Orcs you control.

I — Destroy target creature. If you controlled that creature, draw a card.
II — Choose any number of players. Each of those players may pay {2}. If they do, they create a 1/1 white Orc Citizen creature token and draw a card.
III — Put a +1/+1 counter on each Orc. You become the monarch. Until your next turn, players that control an Orc can't attack you.

cards.rules_text:

[i](As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.)[/i]
When The Siege of Orsinium enters, goad each creature you don't control.
Creatures you control have vigilance.
At the beginning of each player's end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each untapped creature that player controls.
cards.rules_text2:
When The Ruins of Orsinium enters, each player sacrifices a land, then sacrifices half the creatures they control, rounded up.
{T}: Add one mana of any color among the colors of non-land permanents in your graveyard.

II — This Saga gains “Creatures you control have first strike and haste.”

{5}, Exile X nonland permanents you control: If X is greater than or equal to the number of creatures you control, those creatures get +0/+X and gain vigilance and menace until your next turn. Return the exiled creatures to the battlefield at the beginning of your next upkeep.

Instants and Sorceries you control cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, choose one:
• Create a 3/1 red elemental creature token named Fire Atronach.
• Create a 1/3 blue elemental creature token named Frost Atronach.
• Create a 2/2 red and blue elemental creature token named Storm Atronach.

Double strike
If you would create one or more Treasure tokens, instead create that many plus one tokens as long as you control another legendary creature.
Clue abilities cost {1} less as long as you control two or more other legendary creatures.
Whenever a Treasure or Clue is sacrificed, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Deathtouch

Vigilance

If Uzdabikh is equipped, they gain indestructible.
After each combat, if Uzdabikh blocked more than 3 creatures, destroy target equipment attached to Uzdabikh.

Enchant Permanent
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, that creature gets +1/+1 for each Orc you control and has trample and vigilance.
As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has “Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each Orc you control and has trample and vigilance.”

Vigilance
Other Orcs you control have vigilance.
[i]Valiant[/i] — Whenever Vaia becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, distribute half X Shield counters rounded down, among creatures you control, where X equals the number of creatures you control.

Vigilance
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

cards.special_text:

cards.flavor_text: [i]“You don't deserve to call yourself an Orc! You're weak, you're small, and you're an embarrassment! You let giants... Giants!... overrun my shrine. Bring me their leader's club as an offering, and I might release you from this curse!” — Malacath to Chief Yamarz[/i]
